attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr.Brown has no right to remove Britannia or to in any way interfere with our national pride and heritage without a democtatic vote to do so

rejection.details: There is already a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/50pence/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
